attributes.action: The 22 Billion is the governments responsibilities, not the British peoples.
attributes.additional_details: THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD PAY THIS BILL THEMSELVES, IT SHOULD NOT AND WILL NOT BE DOWN TO THE BRITISH PUBLIC TO BAIL YOU OUT OF YOUR RIDICULOUS SPENDING, SHOW ME THE CONTRACT I SIGNED TO DAY THAT THIS WAS OK FOR YOU TO DO.
attributes.background: The 22 billion borrowed by the government, IS NOT FOR THE BRITISH PUBLIC TO PAY, IT IS NOT OUR RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR EXCESSIVE SPENDING, THAT DEBT LIES WITH YOU AND YOU ALONE, WE ARE NOT A BANK TO WHICH YOU CAN PUT US INTO DEBT, I DID NOT SIGN A CONTRACT AGREEING TO THIS.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
